name: EncryptionConfiguration
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
EncryptionConfiguration
description:
Encryption Configuration

A builder for BigQuery table encryption configurations, passed to block arguments to Dataset#create_table and Table#encryption_configuration.

resources.title: Protecting Data with Cloud KMS Keys

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/bigquery"

bigquery = Google::Cloud::Bigquery.new
dataset = bigquery.dataset "my_dataset"
key_name = "projects/a/locations/b/keyRings/c/cryptoKeys/d"
encrypt_config = bigquery.encryption kms_key: key_name
table = dataset.create_table "my_table" do |updater|
  updater.encryption = encrypt_config
end

methods.name: kms_key
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
EncryptionConfiguration#kms_key
methods.description: The Cloud KMS encryption key that will be used to protect the table. For example: projects/a/locations/b/keyRings/c/cryptoKeys/d The default value is nil, which means default encryption is used.

methods.name: kms_key=
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
EncryptionConfiguration#kms_key=
methods.description: Set the Cloud KMS encryption key that will be used to protect the table. For example: projects/a/locations/b/keyRings/c/cryptoKeys/d The default value is nil, which means default encryption is used.
